title: Drizzle Drizzle, Washi Washi
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Mmmngh~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Since there are no visitors, why don’t we have some tea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Even though this Nico came to help you…. Why does it have to rain!? I was going to help a bunch and aim for a headline like “Beautiful Shrine Maiden Found!” or something-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Now, now, let’s save that for another time<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>With that said, there’s really nothing to do~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Thanks to your help, Nicocchi, we’re already done sorting the plaques and the charms, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hey, Nozomi. Do something interesting, will you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Me? Fufu, sure~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hii-....!! W-, wait!! What are you planning to do with those hands!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Nicocchi, you don’t have to be so happy about it~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
